subject: Missing package
description_text:
Hello I recently ordered the three pack of VAM pros, the tracking said delivered and signed for yesterday 10/27/25 at 05:08, unfortunately there is no package delivered to my residence nor my only neighbor, not sure what happened but I unfortunately did not recieve my order. Thank you in advance for your help! 

Sincerely, Tyler
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi StickyFPV,     Please check your front door. If you cannot find it, ask your family members and neighbors. You may also contact the logistics provider at https://www.too.express/ for further information. Thank you for your cooperation.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=TEP00087592168

I have already done all of that, it is no where to be found, also we have a
dog here and never have things delivered to the front door because of it
it’s usually left by our car inbetween vehicles by our gate, also the
tracking said it was signed for and no one around here signed for anything

On Wed, Oct 29, 2025 at 3:35 AM service@simsonn.com

Hello I’m sorry about these circumstances, I still have yet to recieve my
package, I don’t know what to do, this is frustrating. Do I need a refund??
I really wanted the product??

On Wed, Oct 29, 2025 at 12:50 PM StickyFPV <tyler.mitchell7791@gmail.com>
wrote:

> I have already done all of that, it is no where to be found, also we have
> a dog here and never have things delivered to the front door because of it
> it’s usually left by our car inbetween vehicles by our gate, also the
> tracking said it was signed for and no one around here signed for anything
>
> On Wed, Oct 29, 2025 at 3:35 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi StickyFPV,    We're sorry to hear about this unfortunate situation, but since the package has already been delivered, we are unable to file a claim with the carrier. Given the high cost of this product, we will reship it to you, but you will need to cover the $60 shipping fee. While I understand this may be difficult to accept and I am truly sorry for the inconvenience, this is the only solution we can offer at this time to balance the losses for both parties. Thank you for your understanding!

Honestly I understand, I really want the product so I am willing to pay
shipping, can we move forward with this?

On Tue, Nov 11, 2025 at 3:14 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi StickyFPV,    Thank you for your understanding. We will promptly send you a replacement set. You may click this link to complete payment.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-1

Thank you, I have paid for the shipping, once again sorry for this
inconvenience, thank you!!

On Tue, Nov 11, 2025 at 7:22 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi StickyFPV,    Here is your logistics tracking link.  https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/?trknbr=395242433356&trkqual=12029~395242433356~FDEG

Hello thank you so much!!! I just recieved the package in good condition,
only problem is there is no control box. Package had motors, mounts, power
supply, and hardware bag, but no control box??

On Fri, Nov 14, 2025 at 12:22 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi StickyFPV,    The control box is not held in separate stock at our US warehouse; we shall ship it to you from China.

Ok thank you

On Tue, Nov 18, 2025 at 1:14 AM service@simsonn.com
